# Vendor Dependencies

This directory contains the necessary files from reveal.js for the presentation to work on GitHub Pages.

## reveal.js

- **Version**: 5.2.1
- **Source**: https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js/releases/tag/5.2.1
- **License**: MIT

### Included Files

Only the files required for this presentation are included:

- `reveal.js/dist/reset.css` - CSS reset
- `reveal.js/dist/reveal.css` - Core reveal.js styles
- `reveal.js/dist/reveal.js` - Core reveal.js library
- `reveal.js/dist/theme/black.css` - Black theme
- `reveal.js/plugin/highlight/highlight.js` - Syntax highlighting plugin
- `reveal.js/plugin/highlight/monokai.css` - Monokai syntax theme
- `reveal.js/plugin/markdown/markdown.js` - Markdown plugin
- `reveal.js/plugin/notes/notes.js` - Speaker notes plugin

### Updating

To update these files:

1. Download the new reveal.js release from https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js/releases
2. Extract only the files listed above
3. Replace the files in this directory
4. Update this README with the new version number
